title: New Bosch Tour+ Mode Has Auto Assist Adjustment, But You’ve Gotta Work For It
content:
Do you want eMTB software that only helps you when you need it? Maybe something that optimizes range so you can get further into the gnar? Bosch has you covered with its new Tour+ mode, which automatically adds or reduces assistance in the choppy stuff and on climbs, then backs off on flatter terrain. The […]
